contentrichtext.text: == Summary == {{Non-free use rationale|Description=Image of [[Erskine Hamilton Childers]], Irish politician |Source=Official President of Ireland website |Portion=Portrait of head of state; presumed fair use for article about him. |Article=Erskine Hamilton Childers |Purpose=To illustrate Erskine Hamilton Childers |Resolution=Already of sufficiently low resolution |Replaceability=No; subject is dead |other_information= }} == Licensing == {{Non-free biog-pic|Erskine Hamilton Childers|image has rationale=yes}}
